channel.title: Adding music to my client?
channel.description: I have a client and I want some music in there, I found a file for music and I added a song but it isn't playing. Anything I am doing wrong? Im not even sure it can play music, but there is a music folder there so I am assuming it can. All the codes for the mp3 player are there as well, but its not playing lol..

item.title: Adding music to my client?
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

This is what i have on my music.java

[code]import java.applet.Applet;
import java.applet.AudioClip;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.InputStream;
import java.io.PrintStream;
import java.net.MalformedURLException;
import java.net.URL;
import javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException;
import javax.sound.midi.MidiSystem;
import javax.sound.midi.MidiUnavailableException;
import javax.sound.midi.Sequence;
import javax.sound.midi.Sequencer;
import javax.sound.sampled.AudioFormat;
import javax.sound.sampled.AudioInputStream;
import javax.sound.sampled.AudioSystem;
import javax.sound.sampled.DataLine;
import javax.sound.sampled.Clip;
import javax.sound.sampled.FloatControl;
import javax.sound.sampled.LineUnavailableException;
import javax.sound.sampled.SourceDataLine;
import javax.sound.sampled.UnsupportedAudioFileException;
import sign.signlink;

public class Music{

public static Sequencer sequencer = null;
public static Sequence song = null;
public static boolean status = true;

public static void playsong(int i2){
if (i2 == 20) {
if ((sequencer != null) && sequencer.isRunning()) {
sequencer.stop();
sequencer.close();
}
} else {
if ((sequencer != null) && sequencer.isRunning()) {
sequencer.stop();
sequencer.close();
}
try {
if(status) {
sequencer = MidiSystem.getSequencer();
sequencer.open();
song = MidiSystem.getSequence(new File(signlink.findcachedir()+"/Music/"+i2+".mid"));
sequencer.setSequence(song);
sequencer.start();
}
}
catch (MidiUnavailableException e) {}
catch (InvalidMidiDataException e) {}
catch (IOException e) {}
}
}

public static void playsound(int i)
{
  try{     
    if(status) { 
      AudioInputStream stream = AudioSystem.getAudioInputStream(new File(signlink.findcachedir()+"/Sounds/"+i+".wav"));      
      AudioFormat format = stream.getFormat();      
      DataLine.Info info = new DataLine.Info(Clip.class, stream.getFormat());      
      Clip clip = (Clip) AudioSystem.getLine(info);         
      clip.open(stream);      
      clip.start();
    }
  } catch (Exception e)
  {      
  	e.printStackTrace();    
  }  
}

}[/code]

Read full topic
